columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: MacAddress
columns.description: MAC address of the network adapter

columns.name: NetworkAdapterStatus
columns.description: Operational status of the network adapter

columns.name: TunnelType
columns.description: Tunneling protocol, if the interface is used for this purpose

columns.name: ConnectedNetworks
columns.description: Networks that the adapter is connected to (JSON array)

columns.name: IPAddresses
columns.description: All IP addresses assigned to the adapter (JSON array)

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Event identifier based on a repeating counter...

columns.name: NetworkAdapterVendor
columns.description: Manufacturer or vendor of the network adapter

columns.name: OnboardingStatus
columns.description: Whether the device is onboarded to Defender for Endpoint or not

columns.name: NetworkAdapterDnsSuffix
columns.description: Domain suffix assigned to the deviceâ€™s network adapter
